title: Explosion Sounds - Audio Pack
description: 100 + High quality explosions audio files for your game!
longDescription:
Hi There! 


I'm proud to present my explosions audio pack. I've worked here to provide you high-quality assets explosion sounds. 


There are some different styles of explosion in that pack, normal ones, atomic, horror, sci-fi, wood, metal and others, I really hope you like it.


Here's the list:


  • Explosion_01
  • Explosion_02
  • Explosion_03
  • Explosion_04
  • Explosion_05
  • Explosion_Atomic_01
  • Explosion_Atomic_02
  • Explosion_Atomic_03
  • Explosion_Distant_01
  • Explosion_Distant_02
  • Explosion_Distant_03
  • Explosion_Fire_01
  • Explosion_Fire_02
  • Explosion_Fire_03
  • Explosion_Horror_01
  • Explosion_Horror_02
  • Explosion_Horror_03
  • Explosion_Horror_04
  • Explosion_Ice_01
  • Explosion_Ice_02
  • Explosion_Ice_03
  • Explosion_Metal_01
  • Explosion_Metal_02
  • Explosion_Metal_03
  • Explosion_Retro_01
  • Explosion_Sci_Fi_01
  • Explosion_Sci_Fi_02
  • Explosion_Sci_Fi_03
  • Explosion_Water_01
  • Explosion_Water_02
  • Explosion_Water_03
  • Explosion_Wood_01
  • Explosion_Wood_02
  • Explosion_Wood_03

All files contain at least 3 variations! And you're getting it for free :D
